summary:
Apple is an American tech company that makes computers, phones, and other devices. It was started in 1976 by Steve Wozniak and Steve Jobs. At first, they made computers like the Apple II. Later, they made the Macintosh, which had a special way to use the computer with pictures and a mouse.

In the 1990s, Apple had some problems, but they came back strong with new leaders. They made popular products like the iPod and iPhone. Now, Apple is one of the biggest and most valuable companies in the world, but some people criticize its business practices.
title: Apple Inc.
